title: 2015 came up.. A bit too early
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 2015 digit number is multiplied by 54 to yield the last two digits as 68 in the same order. If the same number is multiplied by 46, the last two digits in order are"}]}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #10: A Very Very Long Number
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.74cd726fbc.8RAsYm.png?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
A person writes the numbers 1 to 2015 together as
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"123456789101112131415…201320142015"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
Calculate the total number of occurrences where ‘15’ appears in the whole number."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Done with four lines of Python:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"codeBlock","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1
2
3
4s = ""
for i in xrange(1,2016):
    s = s + str(i)
print s.count('15')


"}],"attrs":[{"text":"s = ""
for i in xrange(1,2016):
    s = s + str(i)
print s.count('15')
","language":null}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Numbers ending with 15 : 015,115,215,...,2015 (21 of them) but 1515 counted just once for now
Numbers begining with 15:150-159,1500-1599, (110 of them) now 1515 counted second time 
Numbers between:1150-1159(10 of them)
two numbers together 501|502,511|512...591|592 and 51|52(11 of them)
So,there  is 21+110+10+11=152 appears of '15'"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here's the list of all the occurrences (not the solution) (spoiler alert):"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1 to 100: 2 occurrences (123…141516…495051525354…)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"101 to 200: 11 occurrences (115…150151152…158159…)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"201 to 300: 1 occurrence (215)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"301 to 400: 1 occurrence (315)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"401 to 500: 1 occurrence (415)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"501 to 600: 11 occurrences 
(501502…511512…515…521522…531532…541542…551552…561562…"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"571572…581582…591592…)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"601 to 700: 1 occurrence (615)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"701 to 800: 1 occurrence (715)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"601 to 900: 1 occurrence (815)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"901 to 1000: 1 occurrence (915)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1001 to 1100: 1 occurrence (1015)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1101 to 1200: 11 occurrences
(1115…114911501151115211531154115511561157115811591160…)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1201 to 1300: 1 occurrence (1215)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1301 to 1400: 1 occurrence (1315)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1401 to 1500: 2 occurrences (1415…1500)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1501 to 1600: 100 occurrences (150015011502…15511552…15581559…15981599)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1601 to 1700: 1 occurrence: (1615)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1701 to 1800: 1 occurrence: (1715)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1801 to 1900: 1 occurrence: (1815)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1901 to 2000: 1 occurrence: (1915)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2001 to 2015: 1 occurrence: (2015)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #11: Find the Largest - Part II
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.d991f8d3e8.HtnWmi.png?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
Which is the largest?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{2015}{32}+\frac{2015}{32^2}+\frac{2015}{32^3}+...+\frac{2015}{32^{2014}}+\frac{2015}{32^{2015}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0.6-0.06+1.2-0.12+1.8-0.18+...+8.4-0.84+9.0-0.90"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"C. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"45+15+5+\frac{5}{3}+\frac{5}{3^2}+...+\frac{5}{3^{14}}+\frac{5}{3^{15}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1+2+3+...+10+11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}
